sense.name: Seize on its way.
sense.commentary: NOTE: Object intercepted must be CONCRETE.
sense.examples: The fighters were ordered to intercept all enemy aircraft. FBI agents intercepted millions in stolen cocaine.

sense.name: Tap a telephone or telegraph wire to get information.
sense.commentary: NOTE: Object intercepted must be ABSTRACT.
sense.examples: CIA agents intercepted information from the phone line of a suspected spy. Allies intercepted secret Japanese communications.
